abstract: Despite a flurry of attention over the deal makers at the Allen & Company media and technology conference, one of the most-mentioned individuals isn’t there: Larry Page of Google.
snippet: Despite a flurry of attention over the deal makers at the Allen & Company media and technology conference, one of the most-mentioned individuals isn’t there: Larry Page of Google.
lead_paragraph: SUN VALLEY, Idaho — Despite a flurry of attention over the deal makers at the Allen & Company media and technology conference here — Rupert Murdoch! John C. Malone! Robert Iger! — one of the most-mentioned individuals isn’t here.

headline.main: At Sun Valley, Conspicuous by His Absence

byline.original: By Michael J. de la Merced
